abstract: Led by a pair of filmmakers from Brooklyn, more than 50 people from more than a dozen American cities are pooling material for a feature-length film about the nascent movement.
snippet: Led by a pair of filmmakers from Brooklyn, more than 50 people from more than a dozen American cities are pooling material for a feature-length film about the nascent movement.
lead_paragraph: Occupy Wall Street, the protest movement that began in Lower Manhattan and quickly spread across the country and around the world, might be coming to a theater near you.

headline.main: Coming Attractions: Occupy Wall St., the Documentary
